articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors Will Face Stern Punishment: Spokesman for KPA Supreme Command
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Regime of S. Korea Will Face Stern Punishment: KPA Supreme Command Spokesman
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army on April 18 issued the following statement:
					 The army and people of the DPRK celebrated in splendor with great national pride the centenary of the auspicious 100th Day of the Sun amid great attention and expectation of the whole world.
					
					 The celebrations were a grand political festival as they demonstrated the unshakable resolution of the army and people of the DPRK to dynamically advance toward the new century of Juche full of conviction and optimism after reviewing with pride the glorious 100-year-long history of Juche Korea.
					
					 The festive atmosphere ran high as Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un was elected to the top post of the party, state and revolution of the DPRK. The world came to look up to the DPRK with admiration and envy, saying that the most prominent man appeared in Korea in the East.
					
					 The people in the south are warmly hailing with national pride and honor the "appearance of extraordinary young leader" as the "rebirth of President Kim Il Sung", the father of the nation and great sage.
					
					 Even at this hour an unprecedented jubilee which started in this land and is spreading to various parts of the world is turning into mankind's events replete with "worship for Kim Jong Un" and "trust in Kim Jong Un".
					
					 It is only traitor Lee Myung Bak and his group that are committing such extreme provocations as chilling the festive atmosphere of fellow countrymen and daring hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					  The Lee group is hurling elder reactionaries of the "ROK Elders Alliance" and student hooligans into Kwanghwamun Square and other parts of Seoul to stage such hideous rowdyism as hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 The group is wirepulling behind the scene such reckless acts as egging riff-raffs on to set up models portraying the supreme leadership of the DPRK and fire at them.
					
					 From right after the grand military parade of the DPRK to celebrate the Day of the Sun, the Lee group let wicked conservative media including Dong-A Ilbo paint a wrong picture of even the image of the dignified DPRK for its false propaganda purpose.
					
					 No matter how frantic the group may get with confrontation with fellow countrymen and no matter how high-handed it may go, there should always be a limit.
					
					 In view of the ceaseless grave provocations which should not be overlooked, the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army, as already declared, solemnly re-clarifies the will to wage an uninterrupted all-army and all-people sacred war to wipe out the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors, the sworn enemy with whom the nation can never live under the same sky.
					
					 The dynamic march past of ranks of paraders and powerful means for limitless strike on the square to celebrate the auspicious Day of the Sun will lead to the Korean-style battles to blow up the stronghold of the group of traitors.
					
					 When the group of traitors committed the thrice-cursed treason against the nation which suffered the great loss last year and hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK at units of the puppet army later, the DPRK warned the group of those crimes and clarified internally and externally its stand to take merciless retaliatory actions.
					
					 What is more irrepressible and intolerable is the resentment of the army and people of the DPRK at the group of traitors.
					
					 The immediate goal of the DPRK is to cut off the windpipes of the group and its followers hell-bent on hideous provocations and blow up the bases for provocations in the land and sky.
					
					 The single-mindedly united army and people of the DPRK who regard the dignity of the supreme leadership as more precious than their own lives will take merciless revenge upon any perpetrator of hideous provocations no matter where he is.
					
					 As even the heart of Seoul is served as a base for provocative acts of hurting the dignity of the DPRK's supreme leadership, the DPRK will take a special action to blow up everything there. 
					
					 Then the group will keenly realize what merciless punishment the whole army and all people of the DPRK will mete out to it for the thrice-cursed treason committed up to now.
					
					 No matter how desperately dogs may bark, they can do nothing against the bright sun. 
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK who hold its supreme commander in high esteem as the eternal sun will step up the historic advance for prosperity at the watershed of history in which a new century of Juche starts, while waging a sacred war to wipe out a tiny handful of group of traitors to the last man.
					
					 Those who dare provoke the inviolable DPRK should bear in mind that they would never be able to escape a stern punishment.

articles.title: CPRK Statement Slams Lee Myung Bak for again Hurting Dignity of Supreme Leadership of DPRK
articles.content:
CPRK Statement Slams Lee Myung Bak for again Hurting Dignity of Supreme Leadership of DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) issued a statement slamming traitor Lee Myung Bak for again committing hideous provocation of hurting the social system and the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					 Traitor Lee malignantly hurt the social system and dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, while talking about nuclear and missile development of the north in an internet and radio speech on April 16 when celebrations for the centenary of the birth of the Day of the Sun were underway in the DPRK.
					
					 He even took issue with the slogan "Let Us Live Our Own Way!" by blustering that the dismantlement of nuclear weapons and reform, opening and changes only are what would keep the north alive.
					
					 The puppet group of traitors mobilized all the ultra-right conservative media, kicking up smear campaign of speaking ill of the celebrations for the Day of the Sun in the DPRK. The group even egged old ultra-right elements and paid conservative youth organizations and other conservative riff-raffs on to fire at the images representing the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and went the lengths of hurting the portraits of the great men of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 This is another unpardonable and thrice-cursed hideous provocation.
					
					 The celebrations for the Day of the Sun marked a grand centennial festival that reviewed with pride the 100-year history of the Sun's Korea, that ended the history of the nation's distress as a wretched colony and demonstrated the biggest honor and dignity, and promised the bright tomorrow of a prosperous reunified country and the future of mankind who has achieved independence. 
					
					 All the Koreans and the world admired the grand celebrations with keen interest and congratulated the great auspicious event with sincerity.
					
					 It was only traitor Lee and his group who kicked up smear campaign, speaking ill of the grand festival held by the compatriots. This proved that they are the worst hooligans bereft of the soul of the nation and conscience as a human being and the most despicable savages with whom one can not live under the same sky.
					
					 The smear campaign kicked up by the puppet group is last-ditch efforts of those shocked by the might of the single-minded unity and the tremendous military power that were demonstrated through the celebrations for the Day of the Sun. It was also the desperate bid to curb the world from cheering the solemn declaration made by the DPRK of the start of the new times of great succession.
					
					 Traitor Lee took the lead in making vituperation only to disclose his nature as a wicked confrontation-minded and anti-reunification element. This was a disgusting deed to maintain his failed confrontation policy and prolong his remaining days at death-bed.
					
					 The Lee group made up of dirty philistines who know nothing but money calculated the fund used for the celebrations, running whole gamut of calumnies and vituperation. But what is incalculable with money is the single-minded unity and the might of Songun.
					
					 Do they know that the DPRK has the single-minded unity of the army and people around the heaven-sent brilliant commander which is more powerful than nuclear weapons and inter-continental ballistic missiles.
					
					 The single-minded unity has guaranteed the glorious 100-year history of Juche Korea and it will guarantee tens of thousands of years of the Sun's Korea to come.
					
					 "Changes" in the DPRK touted by the group is sheer sophism and the puppet group of conservatives faces the stern judgment by the south Koreans who want changes.
					
					 The repeated provocations against the DPRK show that traitor Lee can never drop his nature as a confrontation element and such a wicked man should be punished without mercy. It also proved that the DPRK's judgment and decision were quite right.
					
					 The Koreans including south Koreans can never escape disaster and misfortune if the despicable group of traitors as Lee is allowed to lord it over.
					
					 The indignation and hatred of the army and people of the DPRK at the Lee group of traitors are running sky-high. They are full of pledge to stamp out the hideous provokers to the last man.
					
					 The Lee group will get nothing but destruction from its reckless confrontation racket.
					
					 The group will be made to pay a dear price for its provocations and will never be able to evade the most miserable fate.

articles.title: New York Joint Photo Exhibition Closes
articles.content:
New York Joint Photo Exhibition Closes
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The New York Joint Photo Exhibition--"Windows on North Korea: Photographs from the DPRK" that was opened to celebrate the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung closed on the spot.
					 The AP side of the U.S. selected dozens of photos taken by AP photographers in the DPRK for the past decade according to their themes and made every possible effort in manufacture and display of their collected photos for the successful photo exhibition. Among them were such photos as "A soldier salutes as he marches in a massive military parade held in Kim Il Sung Square in Pyongyang to celebrate the 65th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (Oct. 10, 2010 AP)" and "A dancer, who is participating in an evening gala held in Kim Il Sung Square to celebrate the 65th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea, weeps with emotion when looking up General Secretary Kim Jong Il on the platform (Oct. 10, 2010 AP)".
					
					 The exhibition gave wide publicity to the personality of generals in Mt. Paektu, peerlessly prominent leaders and the sun of all people produced by Korea, while truthfully showing the struggle and life of the Korean people for their social development and others.
					
					 It also vividly dealt with the socialist system in the DPRK which has achieved one victory after another despite the vicious moves of imperialists to stifle it and features of happy people in it.
					
					 The exhibition offered not only people from all walks of life and Koreans in the U.S. but the international community an opportunity to have fresh understanding about the DPRK which has been boosted under the wise guidance of its great leader and great party as the days go by.
					
					 The exhibition marked a good occasion as it totally mended the wrong understanding of the people about the DPRK created due to the biased and distorted propaganda of the West against the former and gave the international community broad understanding and deep sympathy to know well about the socialist system.
					
					 Major media and a lot of internet homepages in different countries gave wide publicity to the whole period of the exhibition. They included New York Times and ABC of the U.S., ITAR-TASS of Russia and Tokyo Broadcasting Service of Japan.

articles.title: Dinner in Pyongyang Marks Closure of KCNA-AP Photo Exhibition
articles.content:
Dinner in Pyongyang Marks Closure of KCNA-AP Photo Exhibition
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- A dinner was given here on Wednesday as regards the successful end of the New York Joint Photo Exhibition--"Windows on North Korea: Photographs from the DPRK" that was opened to celebrate the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there were persons related to the exhibition of the Korean Central News Agency of the DPRK and the Associated Press of the United States.

articles.title: Iranian Army Day Marked
articles.content:
Iranian Army Day Marked 
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Hassan Reza Husseini, military attache of the Iranian embassy here, gave a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club Wednesday on the day of the Iranian army.
					 Present there on invitation were generals and officers of the Korean People's Army, officials concerned, diplomatic envoys of various countries and military attaches here.
					
					 Staff members of the Iranian embassy were present there.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Russian Newspaper
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Russian Newspaper
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a gift from Russian Newspaper Patriot. 
					 The gift was handed to O Sung Ho, charge d'affaires ad interim of the DPRK embassy in Moscow, on April 12 by Demskov, editor-in-chief of the paper.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Go Back Home
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Go Back Home
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests left for home Wednesday by air or train after taking part in the 14th Kimilsungia Festival. They included Wang Dongping, general manager of the Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia Greenhouse in Dandong of China, and his party, Li Xiangjun, vice president of Azalea Branch of the China Flower Association, and his party, Wang Jing, managing director of the Fenghua Electric Co. Ltd., in Changchun City of Jilin Province, China, and his party, Yang Hongzhun, general manager of the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Greenhouse in Hunchun of China, and his party, Ri Yong Ho, managing director of the Dandong Shengmin Trading Co. Ltd., China, and his party and Wu Hailong, general manager of a Dandong trading Co. Ltd., China, and his party.
					 Leaving earlier were a delegation of the Dandong Kwang Myong Sung Energy Research and Development Co. Ltd., headed by its Managing Director Wu Yongzhe, a delegation of the World Yunnan Expo. Horticulture Co. Ltd., China, and Elena Mazur, director of a company of the Nakhodka City Greening Office of Russia, and her party.

articles.title: "Kim Il Sung's Korea", Special Write-ups to Centenary of His Birth (32)
articles.content:
"Kim Il Sung's Korea", Special Write-ups to Centenary of His Birth (32)
Literature and Arts of DPRK Developed in Songun Era
					　　
					
					 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The literature and arts of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, which created renaissance in the 20th century, reached a higher stage of development in the Songun (military-first) era under the guidance of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il clearly indicated the way for building socialist culture, holding high the banner of Songun. He ensured the development of literature and arts by way of Songun revolution, a way of setting a model with reliance on the People's Army and generalizing it in society.
					
					 A drive to follow the revolutionary soldier culture had been conducted throughout the country and, in the course, world-startling achievements made in all spheres of literature and arts, including movie, drama and music.
					
					 They include production of multipart feature film "The Nation and Destiny" (part on workers), feature film "Notes of a Woman Soldier", light comedy "Echo of Mountain" and drama "We Will Recollect Today".
					
					 The grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang", flawless in seed, content and form, was registered in Guinness Book of World Records.
					
					 The Unhasu Orchestra, the Samjiyon Band of the Mansudae Art Troupe and other art troupes gave peculiar performances. The art pieces presented by them are orchestral music and chorus "The Snow Is Falling", which opened up a new path in the creation of musical pieces, and serial symphony "Song Dedicated to the Party" displaying the might of Juche-based symphony orchestra.
					
					 Also lots of famous paintings as valuable as national treasure were produced, among them Korean painting "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il standing near Lake Chon on Mt. Paektu" and large-size screen-style Korean painting "216 peaks on Lake Chon of Mt. Paektu".
					
					 Cultural palaces, including Pyongyang Grand Theatre, Moranbong Theatre, State Theatre and Taedongmun Cinema House, were renovated or built to provide the people with better conditions for their entertainment.
					
					 Acrobatic pieces of the DPRK won top prizes at various international festivals, including the 21st Rome International Acrobatic Festival and the 33rd Monte Carlo International Acrobatic Festival.
					
					 Highest or top prizes and diplomas were awarded to porcelains produced by creators of the DPRK's Mansudae Art Studio and to Korean painters at such international expos as the 10th Beijing International Art Expositions and the Jingdezhen International Porcelain Fair in China-2008.
					
					 Revolutionary opera "The Flower Girl" and Korean versions of operas "A Dream of Red Mansions" and "Liang Shanbo and Zhu Yingtai" were successfully performed before full houses in China, deepening the DPRK-China friendship.
					
					 The Pyongyang Art Troupe, too, made performance tours of China, Russia, Germany and other countries to win enthusiastic cheers and high acclamation from among foreigners and overseas compatriots.
					
					 The feats leader Kim Jong Il performed by displaying the might of the Juche-based literature and arts with his distinguished literary idea and energetic guidance will remain forever along with the history of Kim Il Sung's Korea.

articles.title: S. Korean Religionists Protest against Construction of Jeju Naval Base
articles.content:
S. Korean Religionists Protest against Construction of Jeju Naval Base
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- A general meeting of the south Korean Christian Presbyterian Church held a prayer meeting on the emergency situation at Kangjong Village, Sogwipho City, Jeju Province on April 3 in protest against the construction of the Jeju naval base.
					 The participants denounced the authorities for pushing forward the base construction despite the unanimous opposition of people from all walks life.
					
					 Several religionists were unreasonably arrested and suppressed while protesting against the construction, they said, demanding the authorities set free those arrested at once.
					
					 They said that the organization would continue actions demanding a halt to the construction of the Jeju naval base.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Commemorated by Korean Youth in Japan
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Commemorated by Korean Youth in Japan
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Korean youth in Japan held a meeting to commemorate the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung at the Korean Press Hall in Tokyo, Japan on April 12.
					 Present there were Kim Cha Dol, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, and other officials of the league.
					
					 O Jae Se, chairman of the Kanagawa Prefectural Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), and Song Su Il, teacher at Joson University, referred to the deep loving care shown by the President for the Korean students in Japan who were born and raised on an alien land.
					
					 Kim Cha Dol in his speech noted that the President was a benefactor and teacher of Koreans in Japan and eternal sun of the nation.
					
					 The revolutionary cause of Juche and the movement of Koreans in Japan started by the President and led by General Secretary Kim Jong Il have been successfully carried forward by the dear respected Kim Jong Un, he noted, adding the Korean youth in Japan would remain true to the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A similar meeting took place at the hall of the Kanagawa Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon on the same day.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the portrait of Kim Il Sung and paid tribute to him before watching a video dealing with the loving care shown by the President for the Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The students of Korean Secondary Higher School in Kanagawa sang the song "Broad Smile" and recited a poem "Life-giving Water ", mesmerizing the participants.

articles.title: Korean Book, Photo and Fine Art Exhibitions Held in China
articles.content:
Korean Book, Photo and Fine Art Exhibitions Held in China
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Korean book, photo and fine art exhibitions were held in Shenyang, Dandong and Shanghai cities of China between April 11 and 15 on the occasion of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed in their venues were works of the peerlessly great men, photos on their undying feats and books, photos and fine art works introducing the Korean people who are pushing forward the building of a thriving nation under the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Speeches were made at the opening ceremonies.
					
					 The vice-director of the Culture, Broadcasting Services, Newspapers and Publications Department of Shenyang City said that China and the DPRK have a long-standing history of friendship and have steadily developed exchange and cooperation in the fields of culture and art, in particular.
					
					 The Chinese people sincerely wish the Korean people greater successes in building a thriving socialist nation under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, the vice-director noted.
					
					 The deputy mayor of the Dandong People's Government noted that the Korean people have the time-honored cultural tradition spanning five thousand years, adding that the cultural and artistic level of the fair-minded, diligent and resourceful Korean people is famous worldwide.
					
					 He expressed belief that the current exhibition would help deepen the mutual understanding between the two peoples, offer the Chinese people an opportunity to know better about the modern culture and arts of the DPRK and its people's beautiful feelings and spiritual and moral traits and make a great contribution to developing the Sino-DPRK friendly relations.

articles.title: Korean Book, Photo and Fine Art Exhibition Opens in Russia
articles.content:
Korean Book, Photo and Fine Art Exhibition Opens in Russia
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- A Korean book, photo and fine art exhibition was open in Moscow on April 11 on the occasions of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung and the 80th anniversary of the founding of the heroic Korean People's Army.
					 On display at the exhibition hall were works of the peerlessly great men and photos on their undying revolutionary careers and feats and fine art works associated with the creative talents of the Korean people.
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of the peerlessly great men before paying tribute to them.
					
					 Speeches were made at the opening ceremony.
					
					 The roving ambassador of the Russian Foreign Ministry said that the Russian people are pleased with the great achievements made by the Korean people in economic construction and the work to improve the standard of people's living under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chairperson of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia noted that the President was a great statesman who brought up the Korean people to be strong in independence and turned the DPRK into a socialist power.
					
					 The director of the Russian Centre for the International Scientific and Technological Bulletins said he would boost cooperation with the DPRK in the fields of science and technology in the future and positively contribute to developing the Russia-DPRK friendly relations.

articles.title: Floral Basket Laid before Portrait of Smiling Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Floral Basket Laid before Portrait of Smiling Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- An event for laying a floral basket before the portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung was held by the Organization of Solidarity of the Peoples of Africa, Asia and Latin America on April 12 on the occasion of the centenary of the birth of the President.
					 Present there were Secretary General Alfonso Fraga Perez and other members of the organization and the DPRK ambassador to Cuba and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 The participants laid the floral basket before the above-said portrait and paid tribute to him.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassies from Political Party Leaders of Indonesia, Benin
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassies from Political Party Leaders of Indonesia, Benin
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Megawati Soekarnoputri, general chairwoman of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle, sent a floral basket to the DPRK embassy in her country on April 14 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Written on the ribbon of the floral basket were letters "In celebration of the centenary of the birth of the great leader President Kim Il Sung. Megawati Soekarnoputri, general chairwoman of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle."
					
					 Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, sent a bouquet to the DPRK embassy in his country on April 7.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated in Iran
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated in Iran
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Meetings, photo exhibitions and film shows were held by the International Taekwon-do Association in Iran and Al Hadi Islam Propaganda Organization of Iran and at the Iran-Korea Friendship Magsal Agro-Stock Farm between April 8 and 10 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the Day of the Sun.
					 Displayed in their venues were photos on the undying revolutionary career and feats of the President and photos introducing the true picture of the DPRK.
					
					 The participants of the film shows watched "Pyongyang at Night" and other Korean films.
					
					 The chairman of the International Taekwon-do Association in Iran said that the President was the great leader of the Korean people who devoted his whole life to the happiness of the people and the prosperity of the country and the universally recognized elder statesman.
					
					 The director of the Energy General Bureau of Qazvin Provincial government noted that the President was boundlessly revered by the Korean people and the world progressive people for the great feats he performed on behalf of the era and mankind.
					
					 The director of the farm stressed that the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered by the President was successfully carried forward by General Secretary Kim Jong Il and is now being steadfastly inherited by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Syria
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Syria
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The work of President Kim Il Sung "Socialism in Our Country Is Juche-oriented Socialism" was brought out in pamphlet by the Dar Damascus Publishing House of Syria on the Day of the Sun.
					 The publishing house said in the preface of the pamphlet:
					
					 We have the honor of publishing the work authored by the great leader HE President Kim Il Sung, the founder of the Juche idea and father of socialist Korea, on the occasion of his 100th birth anniversary.
					
					 The DPRK is guided by the Juche idea in its activities.
					
					 The Juche idea clarifies that the master of the revolution and construction is the popular masses and they are capable of promoting the revolution and construction on the basis of the philosophical principle that man is the master of everything and decides everything.
					
					 The DPRK government has firmly established Juche in every field of revolution and construction.
					
					 To establish Juche means solving all issues from independent and creative stands with an attitude of being responsible for revolution and construction in one's own country. 
					
					 It is the principle invariably maintained by the DPRK government to establish Juche in idea, independence in politics, self-support in economy and self-reliance in national defence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Romanian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Romanian Paper
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- A gist of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Historical Lesson in Building Socialism and the General Line of Our Party" was carried by the Romanian paper Romania Muncitoare No. 195.
					 The work, published on Jan. 3, 1992, deals the historic lesson taught by socialist construction and the validity of the general line of the Workers' Party of Korea for it.

articles.title: Portavoz de Comandancia Suprema del EPC condena a camarilla de MB
articles.content:
Portavoz de Comandancia Suprema del EPC condena a camarilla de MB
Pyongyang, 18 de abril (ACNC) -- El portavoz de la Comandancia Suprema del Ejercito Popular de Corea hizo publica el dia 18 la siguiente declaracion:
					En medio de gran atencion y esperanza de todo el mundo, el ejercito y el pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea conmemoraron con solemnidad el centenario del Dia del Sol con el gran orgullo y dignidad nacional, que fue un gran festival politico que hizo balance orgulloso de la gloriosa historia de cien anos de la Corea del Juche y manifesto a todo el mundo la invariable decision de los militares y civiles coreanos tendentes a marchar a pasos firmes hacia la nueva centuria de la Era del Juche.
					
					Al tener al Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un en el puesto cimero de nuestro Partido, Estado y revolucion, el clima del presente festival llego al cielo y el mundo nos miro con envidia diciendo que aparecio un hombre mas celebre en Corea del Oriente.
					
					Tambien los habitantes surcoreanos alzaban las voces de elogio a el llenos de dignidad y orgullo nacionales calificando la "aparicion del lider joven" de "renacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung".
					
					La oleada de tal jubilo sin precedente iniciada en esta tierra, que se extiende a todo el mundo, se convierte en un ferviente entusiasmo de "veneracion a Kim Jong Un" y " confianza en  Kim Jong Un".
					
					Pero, solo el traidor Lee y sus seguidores echan agua fria al clima de la fiesta de los connacionales e insultan atrevidamente nuestra maxima dignidad.
					
					Lanzaron a la Plaza Kwanghwamun y otros lugares a los reaccionarios ancianos pertenecientes a llamada "Alianza de Padres del Sur de Corea" y gangsteres estudiantes a cometer la picardia de difamar nuestra  maxima dignidad.
					
					En la actualidad, la camarilla del traidor Lee manipula por detras a las chusmas para que se atreven a abrir fuego contra los blancos que describen la Maxima Direccion de la RPDC.
					
					Tan pronto como termino el solemne desfile militar del EPC en conmemoracion del Dia del Sol, dio publicidad a sus caprichos falsificando hasta el simbolo de nuestra dignidad a traves de los recalcitrantes medios de prensa conservadores incluyendo Dong-A Ilbo.
					
					La confrontacion fratricida y la barbaridad tienen sus limites. 
					
					Dado que se crean sucesivamente graves situaciones que no podemos observar con brazos cruzados, la Comandancia Suprema del Ejercito Popular de Corea vuelve a aclarar seriamente al interior y exterior del pais la voluntad de desplegar mas intransigente e incansablemente la sagrada guerra pannacional de todo el ejercito y pueblo para exterminar a la banda traidora de Lee Myung Bak, enemigo jurado con el cual no podemos vivir bajo el mismo cielo, como ha declarado ya antes.
					
					El impetu de las columnas de desfile militar y la marcha de los poderosos medios de ataque, mostradas en celebracion del Dia del Sol, se convertiran en la  batalla de ataque a nuestro estilo para destruir el baluarte de la banda traidora.
					
					El ano pasado en el periodo de gran duelo nacional la banda traidora cometio tremendos crimenes nunca tolerables y despues, en algunas unidades militares surcoreanas insultaron nuestra maxima dignidad. 
					
					En aquel entonces, les hemos advertido en varias ocasiones y declaramos al interior y exterior nuestra posicion que insinua la venganza despiadada. 
					
					Ya no es contenible el rencor de nuestro ejercito y pueblo. 
					
					Nuestra meta inmediata es quitarles la vida a la banda traidora y sus seguidores, enloquecidos por las provocaciones de gran dimension, y eliminar sin rastros los nidos de esas provocaciones.
					
					Nuestras fuerzas armadas consolidadas por la unidad monolitica de los militares y civiles que aprecian mas que su vida la maxima dignidad, daran el golpe demoledor a los provocadores quienquiera que sean y dondequiera que esten.
					
					Se tomaran las medidas de accion especial para destruir por completo aunque sea Seul, ya que este se utiliza como punto original de difamacion a nuestra maxima dignidad.
					
					La banda traidora experimentara profundamente cual es la despiadada sentencia de nuestro ejercito y pueblo para saldar cuenta de sus tremendos crimenes cometidos hasta la fecha.
					
					Aunque se desespere la horda de los perros no podra tocar nunca el sol radiante.
					
					En el punto decisivo en que se inicia la nueva centuria del Juche, los militares y civiles coreanos que enaltecen a su Comandante Supremo como eterno Sol, aceleraran por una parte la historica marcha por la prosperidad, y por la otra, desplegaran simultaneamente la sagrada guerra para exterminar a un punado de los traidores.
					
					Los que se atreven a denigrar nuestra maxima dignidad deben darse clara cuenta de que no podran evitar la severa sentencia.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia acto provocativo de banda de traidor Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia acto provocativo de banda de traidor Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 18 de abril (ACNC) -- El Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 18 la siguiente declaracion:
					El peor traidor Lee Myung Bak y sus seguidores surcoreanos volvieron a insultar gravemente el regimen y maxima dignidad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea
					
					El dia pasado 16, cuando la RPDC celebra en su apogeo los actos en celebracion del Dia del Sol, Lee Myung Bak en su discurso online y de radio calumnio siniestramente el regimen y maxima dignidad  de la RPDC cuestionando el desarrollo nuclear y de misiles.
					
					Para colmo, censurando nuestra consigna "!Vivamos a nuestro estilo!" dijo absurdamente que la renuncia de armas nucleares, la reforma, la apertura y el cambio son la unica via para sobrevivir.
					
					Por otra parte, la camarilla de traidores movilizo todos los medios de prensa de conservadores ultraderechistas para difamar los actos conmemorativos del Dia del Sol y lanzo hasta los ancianos ultraderechistas, entidades de jovenes conservadores venales y otras chusmas a atreverse a abrir fuego teniendo como blanco la maxima dignidad de la RPDC y a manchar los retratos de los grandes hombres del monte Paektu.
					
					Esto resulta otro incidente provocativo especial nunca tolerable contra la RPDC.
					
					Los actos conmemorativos del Dia del Sol constituyen un gran festival secular, que puso eterno punto final a la historia llena de vicisitudes en que la nacion coreana debil bajo el coloniaje debia considerar como suerte el servilismo a las potencias y el arruinamiento del pais, hizo balance orgulloso de la centuria de la Corea del Sol que ostenta el maximo orgullo y dignidad y compromete el radiante futuro de la patria reunificada y prospera y el de la humanidad independizada.
					
					Por lo tanto, todos los coreanos y todo el mundo expresaron profunda atencion y admiracion a los actos conmemorativos del Dia del Sol y lo felicitaron sinceramente.
					
					Solo el traidor Lee y sus seguidores se entregaron con frenesi a la campana de complot calumniando a toda costa el gran festival de los connacionales, lo cual demuestra patentemente que ellos son bribones carentes del espiritu de la nacion y de la naturaleza del ser humano y bestiales mas viles, con quienes nunca podemos vivir bajo el mismo cielo.
					
					Esta campana tan diabolica resulta los ultimos esfuerzos desesperados de quienes intentan achicar las estruendosas aclamaciones de todo el mundo a la declaracion solemne que anuncia nueva era de gran sucesion temblando ante el poderio de nuestra unidad monolitica y el de las fuerzas armadas de la RPDC comprobadas a traves de los actos conmemorativos del Dia del Sol.
					
					En particular, tal maldicion de Lee Myung Bak puso al desnudo la naturaleza de perverso maniaco de la confrontacion fratricida y elemento anti-reunificacion, y no pasa de ser conducta grosera tendente a mantener su fracasada politica de enfrentamiento y su destino en agonia.
					
					La banda de Lee, horda de politiqueros, difama con imprudencia hasta los actos en celebracion del Dia del Sol calculandolos con dinero, pero nunca puede calcular con montones de oro la unidad monolitica y el poderio del Songun de la RPDC.
					
					La banda no conoce que esta tiene el arma de la unidad monolitica en torno al comandante insigne, mas poderosa que las armas nucleares y los ICBM.
					
					Gracias a esa unidad monolitica, existe la gloriosa historia de cien anos de la Corea del Juche y esta asegurada con firmeza la eterna historia de la Corea del Sol.
					
					Hablar de nuestro "cambio" es vana ilusion y los conservadores surcoreanos deben ser sometidos a la severa sentencia de los surcoreanos aspirantes al cambio.
					
					Los repetidos actos provocativos de Lee demuestran claramente que este tipejo no renuncia nunca su naturaleza conflictiva aunque renazca cien veces y que fueron correctos nuestro juicio y  decision de castigarle despiadadamente.
					
					Si dejan intactos a esos compinches, los habitantes surcoreanos y otros coreanos no podran evitar las calamidades y desgracias.
					
					El rencor y la hostilidad del ejercito y pueblo de la RPDC sobre dichos compinches llegan al cielo, y ellos estan  dispuestos a exterminar a todos los siniestros provocadores.
					
					Las imprudentes maniobras conflictivas del traidor Lee Myung Bak lo llevaran solo a la ruina y despiadadas  rafagas de venganza.
					
					El traidor Lee Myung Bak y sus compinches pagaran sin falta el precio caro por sus alborotos provocativos y no evitaran el tragico destino.
